description: Stateless MCP server that proxies research queries to Gemini CLI, reducing agent context/model usage

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.capyBearista/gemini-researcher

environmentVariables.description: Gemini API key (optional if you already authenticated Gemini CLI via "gemini" login)
environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Override the project root directory used for path validation (defaults to current working directory)
environmentVariables.name: PROJECT_ROOT

environmentVariables.description: Chunk size threshold (KB) for large responses (default: 10)
environmentVariables.name: RESPONSE_CHUNK_SIZE_KB

environmentVariables.description: Chunk cache TTL in milliseconds (default: 3600000 / 1 hour)
environmentVariables.name: CACHE_TTL_MS

environmentVariables.description: Vertex AI / Google auth: path to a service account JSON credentials file
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS

environmentVariables.description: Vertex AI / Google auth: GCP project ID (used by some auth configurations)
environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT

environmentVariables.description: Vertex AI / Google auth: Vertex AI project identifier (used by some auth configurations)
environmentVariables.name: VERTEX_AI_PROJECT
